build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && mkdir -p database && touch database/database.sqlite && chmod -R 755 storage && chmod -R 755 bootstrap/cache

deploy.startCommand: php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
